references.paper_title: Snapshot compressive imaging: Theory, algorithms, and applications
references.reason: This paper provides a comprehensive overview of the field, serving as a foundational text for the current research.

references.paper_title: EfficientSCI: Densely connected network with space-time factorization for large-scale video snapshot compressive imaging
references.reason: This paper proposes a state-of-the-art method for video snapshot compressive imaging that the current research builds upon and improves.

references.paper_title: Spatial-temporal transformer for video snapshot compressive imaging
references.reason: This paper introduces a transformer-based approach that improves upon previous methods, forming a key part of the comparative analysis in the current research.

references.paper_title: Mamba: Linear-time sequence modeling with selective state spaces
references.reason: This paper introduces the Mamba model, which is central to the novel approach presented in the current work.

references.paper_title: U-net: Convolutional networks for biomedical image segmentation
references.reason: This paper introduces the U-Net architecture, which is a core component of the proposed method in the current research.
